lines.text: create integers startx , starty , endx , endy
set startx with startx = c1 - ' a '
while startx is not endx or starty is not endy
if starty is greater than endy
add element " D " to end of v
add element " U " to end of v
if startx is greater than endx
add element " L " to end of v
add element " R " to end of v
else if starx is greater than endx and starty is greater than endy
lines.code: else if ( startx > endx && starty > endy )

lines.text: add element " LD " to end of v
else if starx is greater than endx and starty is less than endy
lines.code: else if ( startx > endx && starty < endy )

lines.text: add element " LU " to end of v
else if starx is less than endx and starty is greater than endy
lines.code: else if ( startx < endx && starty > endy )

lines.text: add element " RD " to end of v
else if startx is less than endx and starty is less than endy
lines.code: else if ( startx < endx && starty < endy )

lines.text: add element " RU " to end of v
print size of v print newline
for i = 0 to size of v exclusive , print v [ i ] print newline
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < v . size ( ) ; i ++ ) { cout << v [ i ] << endl ; }
